title: Hatrik - The Beast, restored [FLAC]
description:
This is a follow up of my previous version. <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/4078433/Hatrik_-_The_Beast" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/4078433/Hatrik_-_The_Beast</a>

After recording and putting the former torrent on this site I had the feeling I had to restore the recordings.
In a professional way.

Clean the clicks, plops, get the sound as clean as possible.
Consider it to be a remaster.
The band can thank me later.

So these are the professional restored recordings of this album.
Pretty as clean as I can get it for free.

Sorry if you downloaded the former version.
This one is worth downloading.
But hey, it&#039;s for free so it&#039; a bargain to down it again.

-

Recorded from vinyl through MOTU 828 MKII on 24-bit.
Very, very rare.

Chicago, Illinois Heavy Metal act.
The solitary HATRIK album, 1985&#039;s &#039;The Beast&#039; released by Roadrunner Records,
sees a cover of the GRAND FUNK RAILROAD hit &#039;We&#039;re An American Band&#039;.
In early 1988 HATRIK resurfaced under the new guize of TECHNOKILL.

LINE UP

John McPhearson (vocals),
Erik Baumman (guitar),
John Bernardi (bass),
Rich Ryan (drums)

Track Listing
1. Rule Of War
2. We&#039;re An American Band
3. Moov
4. Play To Survive
5. Demon&#039;s Lair
6. The Beast
7. I Like To Eat Out
8. Little Fugue
9. S.O.S.
10. The Other Side Of Crazy
11. Still Of The Night
